full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
**PA Title:** 
IT Technical Services
**Procurement Number:** PW-23-01025160
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** CSPS-RFP-22LL-0628
**Publication Date:** February 8, 2023
**Closing Date for Bids:** March 22, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Notice Details:**
This request for proposal (RFP) is for the provision of specialized IT technical services, including: enhancing and supporting SharePoint Online and Salesforce enterprise solutions, developing business applications and integrating with existing enterprise software solutions.
These services are required by the Chief Digital Officer (CDO) of the Canada School of Public Service (CSPS or the School).

**Contract Details:**
The contract will be for a period of one (1) year from the date of contract award, with an option to extend for up to three (3) additional one-year periods. The expected start date is April 1, 2023, with an estimated delivery date of N/A.

**Eligibility:**
This requirement is open only to those Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who have qualified in Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for categories related to the following job skills: application and software architecture, programming and software development, and data science.

**Trade Agreements:**
Applicable trade agreements include: WTO-AGP, CFTA, CCFTA, CCOFTA, CETA, CHFTA, CKFTA, CPAFTA, CPFTA, CPTPP, and CUFTA.

**Security Clearance:**
Common PS SRCL #6 applies. The minimum corporate security required is Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and the minimum resource security required is Reliability.

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries, please contact Linda Lafreniere, Contracting Authority, at linda.lafreniere@csps-efpc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**
"No notice URL available"

This procurement is subject to the Trade Agreement Act and is subject to the Crown Retains the Right to Negotiate (CRTN) with any supplier on any procurement. Please submit your bid on or before the closing date of March 22, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT.
If you wish to be considered as a bidder, please contact RCNMDAI
